data_table.description: The dataset represents variables used to determine a volunteer's ability/willingness to comply with the DCCT-required at home treatment regimens (e.g. daily blood tests, urine testing, insulin administration, recording of food intake). Information was collected at eligibility screening (see also pht000268, form 56).

variable.name: FORM
variable.description: DCCT form number

variable.name: EGBTDATE
variable.description: Date home behavioral tasks started

variable.name: EGB2A1
variable.description: Urine testing: number of times compliant w/ double void procedure

variable.name: EGB2A2
variable.description: Percentage of compliance with double void procedure

variable.name: EGB2B1
variable.description: Urine testing: number of times urine tests performed

variable.name: EGB2B2
variable.description: Percentage of compliance with urine testing

variable.name: EGB2C
variable.description: Number of positive urine tests (of 58 tests)

variable.name: EGB3A1
variable.description: Number of times compliant with pre-breakfast (blood) tests

variable.name: EGB3A2
variable.description: Percentage of compliance with pre-breakfast (blood) tests

variable.name: EGB3B1
variable.description: Number of times compliant with post-breakfast (blood) tests

variable.name: EGB3B2
variable.description: Percentage of compliance with post-breakfast (blood) tests

variable.name: EGB3C1
variable.description: Number of times compliant with pre-lunch (blood) tests

variable.name: EGB3C2
variable.description: Percentage of compliance with pre-lunch (blood) tests

variable.name: EGB3D1
variable.description: Number of times compliant with post-lunch (blood) tests

variable.name: EGB3D2
variable.description: Percentage of compliance with post-lunch (blood) tests

variable.name: EGB3E1
variable.description: Number of times compliant with pre-supper (blood) tests

variable.name: EGB3E2
variable.description: Percentage of compliance with pre-supper (blood) tests

variable.name: EGB3F1
variable.description: Number of times compliant with post-supper (blood) tests

variable.name: EGB3F2
variable.description: Percentage of compliance with post-supper (blood) tests

variable.name: EGB3G1
variable.description: Number of times compliant with bedtime (blood) tests

variable.name: EGB3G2
variable.description: Percentage of compliance with bedtime (blood) tests

variable.name: EGB3H1
variable.description: Number of times compliant with 3 a.m. (blood) tests

variable.name: EGB3H2
variable.description: Percentage of compliance with 3 a.m. (blood) tests

variable.name: EGB4A1
variable.description: Consistency of adhering to insulin injection schedule

variable.name: EGB4A2
variable.description: Percentage of consistency with insulin injection schedule

variable.name: EGB4B
variable.description: Patient rotated injection site

variable.name: EGB5A1
variable.description: Number of days patient completed a food record

variable.name: EGB5A2
variable.description: Percentage of compliance with keeping a food record

variable.name: EGB6A
variable.description: Number of times patient ate breakfast

variable.name: EGB6B
variable.description: Number of times patient ate morning snack

variable.name: EGB6C
variable.description: Number of times patient ate lunch

variable.name: EGB6D
variable.description: Number of times patient ate afternoon snack

variable.name: EGB6E
variable.description: Number of times patient ate dinner

variable.name: EGB6F
variable.description: Number of times patient ate evening snack

variable.name: EGB7
variable.description: Number of days patient engaged in physical activity

variable.name: FSASDATE
variable.description: Form date as SAS date value

variable.name: MASK_PAT
variable.description: Patient ID number
